messages.content: You are a knowledgeable salesperson specializing in Nike men's clothing.
I'm looking for information on Nike ACG "Reservoir Goat". Can you help?

Sure! The Nike ACG "Reservoir Goat" is Men's Allover Print Shorts. It features: Lightweight, stretchy and packable, these "Reservoir Goat" shorts from ACG are made to do it all. Water-repellent fabric helps shed the moisture during a quick cloudburst or after a misty hike. The lightweight fabric also dries quickly, meaning if even if you get wet, you won't stay wet for long. An allover print depicts the rippling water of Goat Lake in the Northern Cascades.Shown: Ashen Slate/Light Armory Blue/Summit WhiteStyle: FN2474-493. You can view the product here: https://www.nike.com/t/acg-reservoir-goat-mens-allover-print-shorts-1prHGQ/FN2474-493. The price is $90.
You are a knowledgeable salesperson specializing in Nike men's clothing.
I'm looking for information on Kevin Durant. Can you help?

Sure! The Kevin Durant is Men's Dri-FIT Standard Issue Pullover Basketball Hoodie. It features: From his picture-perfect jumper to his savvy business mind, Kevin Durant is a master of his craft on and off the court. Our Kevin Durant signature apparel collection celebrates the next-gen of do-it-all athletes. This relaxed fit layer is ready for any hoops session with its soft, sweat-wicking fabric. Graphics have the official stamp of approval from "Easy Money."Shown: Black/Sail/SailStyle: FN7380-010. You can view the product here: https://www.nike.com/t/kevin-durant-mens-dri-fit-standard-issue-pullover-basketball-hoodie-kWGGWZ/FN7380-010. The price is $86.97.
You are a knowledgeable salesperson specializing in Nike men's clothing.
I'm looking for information on Nike ACG. Can you help?

Sure! The Nike ACG is Men's Dri-FIT Long-Sleeve T-Shirt. It features: Made with heavyweight fabric for soft, structured comfort, this roomy ACG tee brings fresh ripple effect graphics in honor of waves and new beginnings. Plus, our sweat-wicking tech helps you stay dry while you're out exploring the rivers, lakes and streams.Shown: Red StardustStyle: FV3486-618. You can view the product here: https://www.nike.com/t/acg-mens-dri-fit-long-sleeve-t-shirt-x8CjXP/FV3486-618. The price is $60.
You are a knowledgeable salesperson specializing in Nike men's clothing.
I'm looking for information on Nike Club. Can you help?

Sure! The Nike Club is Men's Flow Shorts. It features: Lightweight and breezy, these unlined Flow shorts from our Nike Club collection are built for all your warm-weather activities. The relaxed, above-the-knee fit makes them easy to style, so pull them on with a tee or hoodie and make your move.Shown: Midnight Navy/WhiteStyle: FN3098-410. You can view the product here: https://www.nike.com/t/club-mens-flow-shorts-PsQ5w3/FN3098-410. The price is $60.

I'm looking for information on Nike ACG. Can you help?

Sure! The Nike ACG is Men's Dri-FIT T-Shirt. It features: A mix of heavyweight blended fabric and a roomy fit makes this ACG tee the GOAT. Nike Dri-FIT technology moves sweat away from your skin for quicker evaporation, helping you stay dry and comfortable.Shown: Dark StuccoStyle: FV3492-053. You can view the product here: https://www.nike.com/t/acg-mens-dri-fit-t-shirt-63zrCD/FV3492-053. The price is $55.

Sure! The Nike ACG "Reservoir Goat" is Men's Shorts. It features: Lightweight, stretchy and packable, these quick-dry "Reservoir Goat" shorts from ACG are made to do it all. Water-repellent fabric helps shed the moisture after a misty hike or refreshing dip. I'm looking for information on Nike Primary. Can you help?

Sure! The Nike Primary is Men's Dri-FIT Versatile Tank. It features: Run, spin, lift, stretch—no matter where your workout takes you, we have you covered in the sweat-wicking Primary Tank. It's ultra soft and comfortable, with underarm ventilation to help keep you cool during your reps.Shown: White/WhiteStyle: DV9833-100. You can view the product here: https://www.nike.com/t/primary-mens-dri-fit-versatile-tank-RcQ41g/DV9833-100. The price is $55.

I'm looking for information on Nike Primary. Can you help?

Sure! The Nike Primary is Men's Dri-FIT UV Versatile Crew. It features: This soft, sweat-wicking crew is built for wearing during your toughest workouts. It's made with midweight double-knit fabric that feels smooth on both sides with a touch of stretch. Plus, the fabric helps block UV rays when you're outdoors.Shown: Obsidian/Heather/ObsidianStyle: FZ0971-473. You can view the product here: https://www.nike.com/t/primary-mens-dri-fit-uv-versatile-crew-9cQgFg/FZ0971-473. The price is $75.
